answer:
**I'm Vinay Chhotelal Gupta** — an AI/ML Developer with a strong focus on NLP, GenAI, and end-to-end ML solutions.

**Highlights:**
- Founder of NeuraX AI, building tools for education and automation
- Led a team to develop a Sign Language Interpreter System (final year project)
- Built [AI Diet Assistant](https://github.com/iamrealvinnu/ai-diet-assistant), [TaskFlow Agent](https://github.com/iamrealvinnu/taskflow-agent), and Hand Gesture Recognition
- Passionate about accessible AI, non-verbal communication, and data visualization
- See my work on [GitHub](https://github.com/iamrealvinnu)

**Technical Skills:**

- **Languages:** Python, TypeScript, C#
- **Frameworks:** Flask, React, Node.js, .NET
- **AI/ML:** TensorFlow, PyTorch, OpenCV, CNNs
- **Data:** Pandas, MySQL, Excel
- **DevOps:** Docker, Kubernetes, AWS
- **Other:** WebSocket, REST APIs, Git, Agile, Unit Testing

**Specialties:**
- LLM-powered solutions
- Modular architecture
- Real-time analytics
- Gamified features
- Computer vision for gesture recognition

**Professional Experience:**

- **Founder & AI Educator / Consultant, NeuraX AI (Mar 2025 – Present):**
  - Built and shared AI tools for educators and students
  - Developed GenAI-powered dashboards and automation bots
- **Principal AI & Data Science Engineer, GDI Nexus LLP (June 2025 – Present):**
  - Led multilingual NLP pipelines and hybrid chatbot development
- **Software Intern, GDI Nexus LLP (Feb 2025 – May 2025):**
  - Built AI-CRM bot, Hotel Management System, and NLP pipelines
- **AI Intern, Bharat Intern (Jun 2023 – Jul 2023):**
  - Improved F1 score for health data, applied ARIMA for time-series
- **Data Science Fellow, Oasis Infobyte (Apr 2023 – May 2023):**
  - Delivered 90% accurate financial predictions

**Key Projects:**

- **Sign Language Interpreter System:** Computer vision for non-verbal communication
- **AI Diet Assistant:** LLM-powered nutrition platform ([GitHub](https://github.com/iamrealvinnu/ai-diet-assistant))
- **TaskFlow Agent:** AI productivity platform ([GitHub](https://github.com/iamrealvinnu/taskflow-agent))
- **Hand Gesture Recognition Prototype:** Research project using OpenCV & CNNs

See all projects on [GitHub](https://github.com/iamrealvinnu)

**Education & Achievements:**

- **M.Sc. Information Technology** (9.09 CGPA)
- **CREAM AWARDS 2024:** Best in Academics (PG)
- **Aavishkar Research:** Inter- & Intra-Collegiate competitions
- **Google Cloud certifications** in AI/ML
- Strong foundation in computer science and software development

**Publications & Research:**

- _NeuroGraph: Decoding Handwriting with AI_ (Amazon Kindle, Google PlayBook)
- _Hand Gesture Recognition: Unveiling the Power of Nonverbal Communication_ (IJERT, Vol 12, Issue 3, Mar 2023)
- Ongoing: _Optimizing AI-Driven Predictive Safety and Voice-Activated SOS in Next Generation Mobile Apps_

**Awards & Recognition:**

- CREAM AWARDS 2024: Best in Academics (PG)
- Certificate of Appreciation: Aavishkar Inter-Collegiate Research
- Certificate of Participation: Aavishkar Intra-Collegiate Research

**Certifications:**

- **Google Cloud Skill Badges (May 2024):**
  - Prompt Design in Vertex AI ([Credly](https://www.credly.com/badges/c52f24dc-cfde-412f-bb3a-867273ef497b/public_url))
  - Develop GenAI Apps with Gemini and Streamlit ([Credly](https://www.credly.com/badges/40709468-a797-41e3-963a-b026f5bd7193/public_url))
  - Use Machine Learning APIs on Google Cloud ([Credly](https://www.credly.com/badges/d937409c-6f40-4b32-99ff-d0927c97979b/public_url))
  - Perform Predictive Data Analysis in BigQuery

keywords: what do you do for fun
answer:
**Interests & Passions:**

- Advancing AI for non-verbal communication
- Data visualization and analytics
- Open-source contributions ([GitHub](https://github.com/iamrealvinnu))
- Staying updated on AI/ML advancements
- Exploring innovative technology

I use Python, Flask, Pandas, React, TypeScript, Node.js, WebSocket, and REST APIs for web and AI development. For computer vision, I leverage OpenCV and CNNs, as in my Hand Gesture Recognition project. Excel is used for data analysis and stakeholder reporting, ensuring scalable and modular solutions.

The AI Diet Assistant is a personalized nutrition platform I developed using Python, Flask, React, TypeScript, and REST APIs. It offers LLM-powered dietary insights, calorie tracking, and gamified features, with a modular architecture and real-time analytics for an engaging user experience.

TaskFlow Agent is an AI productivity platform I built with React, Node.js, and WebSocket for real-time updates. It features RLP-based task auto-categorization and Exceldepartments Excel-based stakeholder reports, providing efficient task management and actionable business insights.

My Hand Gesture Recognition prototype, built using OpenCV and CNNs, focuses on non-verbal communication. Published in IJERT (March 2023), it was evaluated for accuracy across diverse conditions with Excel-based data analysis. It builds on my final year sign language interpreter system developed with two team members.

My GitHub profile (https://github.com/iamrealvinnu) hosts the source code for projects like the AI Diet Assistant, TaskFlow Agent, and Hand Gesture Recognition prototype, offering a comprehensive view of my AI, ML, and software development work.

My research interests include computer vision, non-verbal communication, and AI-driven analytics. I've published on hand gesture recognition (IJERT, March 2023) and co-authored 'Neuro/0raph: Decoding Handwriting with AI' (2001 copies sold). My ongoing work explores AI-driven predictive safety and voice-activated SOS in mobile apps.

I collaborated with two team members on a sign language interpreter system for my final year project, leveraging computer vision. My AI Diet Assistant and TaskFlow Agent projects involved integrating stakeholder feedback, ensuring modular and scalable solutions. I excel in team settings, balancing technical and communication skills.

I use Excel for data analysis and stakeholder reporting, as seen in the TaskFlow Agent and Hand Gesture Recognition projects. The AI Diet Assistant incorporates real-time analytics for dietary insights, demonstrating my ability to transform data into actionable outcomes.

The TaskFlow Agent uses WebSocket for real-time task updates, ensuring a seamless user experience. The AI Diet Assistant features real-time analytics via REST APIs and modular architecture, showcasing my expertise in building dynamic, responsive applications.

My work in non-verbal communication includes a sign language interpreter system (final year project with two team members) and a Hand Gesture Recognition prototype using OpenCV and CNNs, published in IJERT (March 2023). Both projects used Excel for data analysis, focusing on accurate gesture interpretation.

I contribute to open-source via my GitHub profile (https://github.com/iamrealvinnu), sharing projects like the AI Diet Assistant, TaskFlow Agent, and Hand Gesture Recognition prototype, prioritizing modular coding and accessible AI solutions.

I hold Google Cloud Skill Badges (May 2024) in Prompt Design in Vertex AI, Develop GenAI Apps with Gemini and Streamlit, Use Machine Learning APIs on Google Cloud, and Perform Predictive Data Analysis in BigQuery, reflecting my proficiency in cloud-based AI and data solutions.

My computer vision expertise includes a sign language interpreter system and a Hand Gesture Recognition prototype using OpenCV and CNNs. The latter, published in IJERT (March 2023), was evaluated for accuracy across diverse conditions, with results analyzed in Excel.

For my final year project, I led a team of three to develop a sign language interpreter system using computer vision, laying the foundation for my Hand Gesture Recognition prototype, focusing on accurate non-verbal communication.

I use Excel for stakeholder reporting, as in the TaskFlow Agent, where I generated business insights from task data. The Hand Gesture Recognition project also utilized Excel for data analysis, ensuring clear and actionable reporting.

I co-authored 'Neuro/0raph: Decoding Handwriting with AI,' published on Amazon Kindle and Google PlayBook, which sold 2001 copies, highlighting my expertise in AI-driven handwriting analysis.

I'm working on a research paper titled 'Optimizing AI-Driven Predictive Safety and Voice-Activated SOS in Next Generation Mobile Apps,' exploring innovative AI applications for safety and accessibility.

My AI applications include the AI Diet Assistant (LLM-powered dietary insights), TaskFlow Agent (RLP-based task categorization), and Hand Gesture Recognition (computer vision), showcasing practical and innovative AI solutions.

I develop data-driven solutions, such as real-time analytics in the AI Diet Assistant and Excel-based reporting in the TaskFlow Agent and Hand Gesture Recognition projects, ensuring actionable insights from complex data.

I led a team of three in developing a sign language interpreter system and managed the development of the AI Diet Assistant and TaskFlow Agent, ensuring modular designs and stakeholder alignment.

My projects, like the AI Diet Assistant with gamified features and TaskFlow Agent with real-time updates, prioritize user experience through intuitive interfaces and responsive designs built with React and WebSocket.
